heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy, with scattered morning snow or rain showers.  Lots of clouds, a sprinkle or flurry, and limited breaks of sun midday and afternoon. Highs in the 30s and low 40s.  Winds southwest 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Some clearing south of the Adirondacks and Rt. 2, more clouds north.  Increasing clouds from the south late.  Lows in the 20s.  Winds diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Some sun from the Adirondacks and Rt. 2 north, then cloudy.  A rising chance of snow from Lake George and Rt. 4 south, possibly mixed with rain in the valleys.  Highs in the 30s.  Winds light and variable.
